entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UseAngularCliServer blocked by node processes it's leaving open from prior execution #36250
  • Error running signalr in google app engine #36249
  • Startup regression: json #36244
  • Perf improvement: json #36243
  • SQLException when using usermanager.ResetPasswordAsync #36240
  • Named Tuples On RenderFragments Not Working and Razor intellisense is holding onto reference #36229
  • Offload websocket receive to scheduler threads #36226
  • When launching WebAssembly hosted app from VS2022 Pre5, changes are not shown #36225
    6.0-rc2
  • dotnet watch script injection still doesn't update etag #36219
    6.0.0
  • dotnet watch hot reload not working in default WebAssembly Hosted project template (RC2) #36218
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup improvement: json #36217
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef, updates #36216
  • POSTing large form data silently results in null-parameters #36214

Closed

  • dotnet watch only trigges on changes OUTSIDE VisualStudio #34418
    6.0-rc2
  • Razor Source Generator is throwing and Razor tooling never lights up #36227
    6.0-rc2
  • Docs for delayed client certificates #34006
    6.0.0
  • Add an option to the Web API project template to allow the included content to use Minimal APIs instead of controllers #35996
    6.0-rc2
  • Kestrel on Debian/Ubuntu not sending private intermediate cert #36202
  • dotnet dev-certs tool prints incorrect example usage #36008
    7.0-preview1
  • 🐞 `WebApplication.CreateBuilder(args).Host.Properties` cannot share context value. #36197
  • a typeparam property set unexpectedly to null after changing the Value of another typeparam #34160
    Discussions
  • ComplexObjectModelBinder sealed and setProperty internal #33545
    Discussions
  • OnParameterSetAsync is triggered when using a CascadingParameter and NavigationManager #33785
    Discussions
  • Trigger msbuild target when hot reload detects Razor file change (Blazor) #33861
    Discussions
  • Feature Request: Blazor: Handling of ambiguous routes #33963
    Discussions
  • InputFile Improvements #34040
    Discussions
  • [Annoucement] ClientCertificate property no longer triggers renegotiation for HttpSys #34124
    Discussions
  • Navigating to non blazor page from blazor makes referrer incorrect #34198
    Discussions
  • WebApplicationBuilder.WebHost.UseUrls() does not do anything in ASP.NET Core 6 Preview 7 #36245
  • Startup regression: plaintext #36200
  • Perf regression: mvc #36215
  • ProtectKeysWithCertificate(thumbprint) does NOT Throw an Exception if the Certificate is Inaccessible due to Permissions #35602
    6.0-rc2
  • Hot reload not working in visual studio 2022 preview #35902

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0 Cleanup remaining SSP references #36248
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport #36207 to 6.0 #36247
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Update branding for 5.0.11 #36236
  • Update branding for 3.1.20 #36235
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Update selenium version for E2E tests #36231
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] [Static web assets] Fix casing issues during parsing #36228
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Add minimal option to webapi template (#36068) #36241
    7.0-preview1
  • Fix sample usage for --format argument #36009
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Big-endian fixes: binary data in RenderBatch #36221
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Don't log status messages for debug proxy. Fixes #35292 #36223
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Adding test coverage for host builder properties #36201
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Make E2E tests work on Linux, support retries, and have new Azure pipeline #36207
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update selenium version for E2E tests #36230
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Update ChromeDriver version #36232
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0]: Fix how host configuration is handled in WebApplicationBuilder #36233
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting
  • Add minimal option to webapi template #36068
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] React to dotnet/runtime#57816 #36155
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Fix how host configuration is handled in WebApplicationBuilder #36186
    feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks
  • Update templates to use scoped CSS (#35658) #36027
    area-mvc
  • [Static web assets] Fix casing issues during parsing #35564
    area-mvc
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Don't log status messages for debug proxy. Fixes #35292 #36220
    area-blazor
  • Big-endian fixes: binary data in RenderBatch #35714
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Move OpenAPI extensions to routing assembly #36161
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support platforms where crossgen2 is not available #35916
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Bootstrap v4 support #35981
    area-identity
  • [Blazor] Update npm dependencies #36088
    area-blazor
  • Add analyzer for detecting mismatched endpoint parameter optionality #36154
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix root '<PageTitle>' not working when a default, static '<title>' is provided #36099
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • [SignalR] Add Http options to Negotiate metadata #36078
    area-signalr
  • WIP: Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • Add build troubleshooting suggestion #36178
    area-infrastructure
  • Reuse NegotiateMetadata #36184
    area-signalr
